avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow subsided and melted in thaw since Saturday. The snowpack is expected to be isothermal, rather homogeneous and stable most places. The little new snow that adds on top may bond poorly with underlying snow and cause the possibility of small avalanches in isolated steep slopes and gullies.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow subsided and gained strength in thaw in the beginning of the week. Dry snow that has added on top can have formed unstable wind slabs. New unstable wind slabs are expected form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New unstable wind slabs can form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar él á fimmtudag en síðan þurrt. Kólnar um helgina.

avalancheActivity.comment: Many small avalanches released in Kirkjubólshlíð, probably in the rain the night before Wednesday 20.2. The largest avalanche stopped 50 m above the road. Small sluffs released in the area in warm weather and sunshine last weekend.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Older snow subsided in warm weather in the first half of the week and weak layers gained strength. New snow that falls on Wednesday and Thursday can form new unstable wind slabs, especially in S-W aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The weather was warm from Saturday to Tuesday and the snow subsided and partly melted. Weak layers in the snowpack seem to have gained strength and the old snow should now be generally stiff and stable. New snow that falls on Wednesday and Thursday in strong NE winds can however form new unstable wind slabs on top, especially in S-W aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow subsided and gained strength in thaw in the beginning of the week. Dry snow that has added on top can have formed unstable wind slabs. New unstable wind slabs are expected form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New unstable wind slabs can form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Éljagangur á miðvikudagskvöld. NA-hríðarveður seinnipart fimmtudags með talsverðri viðbót á snjó. Dregur smám saman úr á föstudag og kólnar. Kalt og þurrt um helgina.

avalancheActivity.comment: 300 m wide slab in Burstabrekkudalur was spotted 19.2. which has likely been triggered by the warming on 18.2. A snowmobile triggered another slab in Upsadalur above Dalvík 10.2.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has settled in the warming during the weekend but still a weak layer is persistent that shows quite easy propagation as the 300 m wide slab in Burstabrekkudalur confirms. Turning to northerly winds with snowshowers on Thursday night until Saturday

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow has settled in the warming during the weekend but still a weak layer is persistent. Stability tests in Skarðsdalur 17.2. showed quite easy propagation on the interface to the uppermost ice layer in the snowpack. Little snow was added in a short period of NA-winds on Wednesday morning

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow subsided and gained strength in thaw in the beginning of the week. Dry snow that has added on top can have formed unstable wind slabs. New unstable wind slabs are expected form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New unstable wind slabs can form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýst í N-læga átt á fimmtudagskvöld með éljum fram á lau.

avalancheActivity.comment: A slab avalanche released in Skagafell in Fagridalur 18/2 and wet loose avalanches released in Norðfjörður. Sowmobile triggered an avalanche above Fáskrúðsfjörður 14/2.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow that fell on Wednesday may have formed new unstable wind slabs, especially in V-N aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Older snow subsided in warm weather in the first half of the week and weak layers gained strength. Older snow should now be generally stiff and stable. Snow added in mountains on Wednesday and drifted in S-E winds. New unstable wind slabs may have formed in leesides and gullies, on top of the old snow. On Friday, snow is forecasted to add in NW winds. Wind slabs may then form in more aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow subsided and gained strength in thaw in the beginning of the week. Dry snow that has added on top can have formed unstable wind slabs. New unstable wind slabs are expected form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New unstable wind slabs can form in NE snowstorm the northern half of Iceland on Thursday, especially in Strandir and northern Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Úrkomulítið og hægur vindur á fimmtudag. Éljagangur í NV átt á föstudag. Hiti í kringum frostmark á láglendi, frost til fjalla. Styttir upp um helgina og kólnar.
